\begin{document}

\bibliography{paper}

% Supplementary material
\appendixpageoff
\appendixtitleoff
\renewcommand{\appendixtocname}{Supplementary material}
\begin{appendices}
\crefalias{section}{supp}
\normalsize

\begin{filecontents}{\jobname-support.tex}

\pagenumbering{roman}
\input{sections/supp}
\end{filecontents}
\include{\jobname-support}
\end{appendices}
